entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
